Product Title: The GiggleBellies Musical Adventures Volume #1
Review Date: 2015/02/13
Store: Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD
Product Description: ['Meet the lovable GiggleBellies! A fresh and modern twist to preschool DVD\'s and music is finally here. Watch "The GiggleBellies" giggle and wiggle right into your little one\'s hearts. The Engaging multi-award winning DVD series combines colorful whimsical worlds, endearing characters, and fun upbeat music that even parents can enjoy! This fully animated music video DVD will keep your toes tapping and everyone can join the fun by singing and dancing along. Winner of multiple awards and accolades including “2010 DVD OF THE YEAR AWARD by Creative Child Magazine” and “Dr. Toy\'s Best Picks 2013”. Approximately 28 minutes with 9 animated music videos including:   The GiggleBelly Train  Old MacDonald Had A Farm  Wheels On The Bus  Peanut  ABC Superstar  Web Footed Friends  Jumping Monkeys  Kooky Bird  Twinkle Twinkle Little Star -adapted version with male singer.   You will need a computer with a DVD drive to access Downloadable & Printable items:  MP3’s of all 9 songs to download and create your own music CD  10 coloring pages  9 Fully illustrated lyric sheets  2 Fun & fantastic wallpapers  DVD runs Approx. 28 min, Region 0, Format NTSC.  DVD’s are designed to be viewed on anything that can play a DVD. If you expect to view our products across multiple media platforms, such as mobile devices, Apple TV, etc., please look for digital options via our online store. Not familiar with The GiggleBellies? Preview before you purchase! Subscribe to “The GiggleBellies” YouTube Channel and watch lower-res preview clips with your child to see if they enjoy it.']

raw_response:
**Preferences and Trends:**

- **Family-Oriented Content:** Strong preference for kids' movies and animated series featuring engaging, humorous themes suitable for children and family viewing.
  
- **High Ratings:** Consistently high ratings (4.6-5.0), indicating satisfaction with purchases. 

- **Engaging and Educational:** Interest in content that balances entertainment with educational value, seen in preferences for music, songs, and relatable characters.

- **Repetitive Viewing:** Enjoys films that can be rewatched by the family, indicating lasting appeal. 

- **Positive Reviews:** Frequent use of positive language in reviews highlights enthusiastically shared enjoyment, especially among children.

- **Animated Features:** A clear trend towards animated and music video formats, with a preference for vibrant, colorful visuals and catchy tunes.

- **Diverse Genres:** Variety in genres including music videos, family films, and comedic-themed content, reflecting an appreciation for diverse entertainment options that appeal to both children and adults.

- **Child-Centric Themes:** Consistent choice of materials focusing on themes such as adventure, friendship, humor, and moral lessons aimed at preschool and early childhood demographics.

- **Engagement with Characters:** A tendency to appreciate shows featuring lovable, relatable characters that resonate with children, fostering strong emotional connections.

Overall, the consumer exhibits a distinct preference for high-quality, family-friendly content that entertains while enriching the viewer experience with music, humor, and relatable storytelling.

target_interaction.title: Watch it over n over
target_interaction.text: Great movie for the whole family
description: From Disney comes the thrilling and vibrant live-action adaptation of the animated classic Aladdin, the exciting tale of the charming street rat Aladdin, the courageous, self-determined Princess Jasmine and the Genie who may be the key to their future.
